function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of access to healthcare","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and uncontrolled outbreaks","Mitigation":"Improve access to healthcare, implement disease surveillance, and provide healthcare education","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health records, and disease tracking apps","People":"Migrant workers, low-income populations, and people in rural areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and NGOs"},{"Description":"Poverty leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to diseases and reduced ability to access healthcare","Mitigation":"Implement poverty reduction policies, provide financial support, and improve social security measures","Technologies":"Mobile banking, digital payment systems, and social security platforms","People":"Low-income populations, migrant workers, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, international aid organizations, and NGOs"},{"Description":"Weak rural infrastructure exacerbating disease spread","Impact":"Limited healthcare access and difficulties in disease prevention and control","Mitigation":"Invest in rural healthcare, improve infrastructure, and enhance disease surveillance","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote diagnostic tools, and rural healthcare apps","People":"Rural populations, agricultural workers, and communities in remote areas","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and infrastructure development agencies"}]}
